title: bad customers
author: Ice Cream Sandwich
description:
Annoying customers are annoying. These are times I met the most notable customers and shoppers when I worked at the UPS store. I thought working in food jobs would be worse but I think I had a worse time in the UPS store. Looking back now I think it was funny. In the moment though it was less of that and more annoying. Crazy customers be crazy. And I imagine people working in retail now have even crazier stories from the past year. My stories are from years ago.



Villa helped with this animation and did a really good job here is their twitter account: https://twitter.com/hi_blnd


thanks for watching ❤️ see you next video.

(new merch is happening so I won't plug what I have now)
📱 twitter:
https://twitter.com/ICSandwichGuy
📷 instagram:
https://www.instagram.com/icecreamsandwichguy/



DISCLAIMER: Ice Cream Sandwich content is inappropriate for children under 13 years old. For children over 13 years old, parental discretion is advised. Ice Cream Sandwich does not control the comments produced by third-party users. By watching, reading, or otherwise consuming Ice Cream Sandwich content, you agree that (1) you are over the age of 13 years, (2) you agree to abide by Youtube's Terms of Service, and (3) you agree you have read and accept the disclaimer available at https://www.youtube.com/icecreamsandwich/about

localize.description:
烦人的顾客很烦人。这些都是我在UPS店工作时遇到的最引人注目的顾客和购物者。我以为从事食品工作会更糟糕，但我认为我在UPS店的工作更糟糕。现在回想起来，我觉得很有趣。不过在当时来说，那是少了点什么，多了点烦恼。疯狂的顾客就是疯狂。而且我想现在在零售业工作的人在过去的一年里有更疯狂的故事。我的故事是多年前的。



维拉公司帮忙做了这个动画，做得非常好，这是他们的微博账号：https://twitter.com/hi_blnd。


谢谢观看❤️下次视频见。

(新的商品正在发生，所以我不会插手我现在的东西)
📱 twitter。
https://twitter.com/ICSandwichGuy
📷 instagram。
https://www.instagram.com/icecreamsandwichguy/

localize.title: 恶客

localize.description:
煩人的顧客很煩人。這些都是我在UPS店工作時遇到的最引人注目的顧客和購物者。我以爲從事食品工作會更糟糕，但我認爲我在UPS店的工作更糟糕。現在回想起來，我覺得很有趣。不過在當時來說，那是少了點什麼，多了點煩惱。瘋狂的顧客就是瘋狂。而且我想現在在零售業工作的人在過去的一年裏有更瘋狂的故事。我的故事是多年前的。



維拉公司幫忙做了這個動畫，做得非常好，這是他們的微博賬號：https://twitter.com/hi_blnd。


謝謝觀看❤️下次視頻見。

(新的商品正在發生，所以我不會插手我現在的東西)
📱 twitter。
https://twitter.com/ICSandwichGuy
